channel.title: Comments on: No Browser For Surfing? Get Some Help

item.title: By: proposal writing service
item.dc:creator: proposal writing service
item.description: Web designers use a variety of different tools depending on what part of the production process they are involved in. These tools are updated over time by newer standards and software but the principles behind them remain the same. Web graphic designers use vector and raster graphics packages for creating web formatted imagery or design prototypes. Thanks.
item.content:encoded: Web designers use a variety of different tools depending on what part of the production process they are involved in. These tools are updated over time by newer standards and software but the principles behind them remain the same. Web graphic designers use vector and raster graphics packages for creating web formatted imagery or design prototypes. Thanks.

item.title: By: jaffa
item.dc:creator: jaffa
item.description: Web design is a broad term covering many different skills and disciplines that are used in the production and maintenance of websites. The different areas of web design include, web graphic design, interface design, authoring, including standardised code and proprietary software, user experience design and search engine optimisation. Thanks. Regards,
item.content:encoded:
Web design is a broad term covering many different skills and disciplines that are used in the production and maintenance of websites. The different areas of web design include, web graphic design, interface design, authoring, including standardised code and proprietary software, user experience design and search engine optimisation. Thanks.
Regards,

item.title: By: TotalTerran
item.dc:creator: TotalTerran
item.description: This is very handy, i have come across people wherein their IE8 have failed and there are no other browsers available on their PCs, now i can download other browsers from here! very very good Info!! Thanks
item.content:encoded: This is very handy, i have come across people wherein their IE8 have failed and there are no other browsers available on their PCs, now i can download other browsers from here! very very good Info!! Thanks

item.title: By: Steve M.
item.dc:creator: Steve M.
item.description:
Just to make it clear, this might not help people who work somewhere with Web filtering; it's for people who don't have access to Internet Explorer (or another browser) at all.
I tried it at my company that blocks certain things (proxies, video, my Web site's log-in) and none of those worked -- which makes sense because they're probably filtering at the protocol or packet level.
item.content:encoded:
Just to make it clear, this might not help people who work somewhere with Web filtering; it’s for people who don’t have access to Internet Explorer (or another browser) at all.

I tried it at my company that blocks certain things (proxies, video, my Web site’s log-in) and none of those worked — which makes sense because they’re probably filtering at the protocol or packet level.
